overview:

The only concern that this Sterling Heights dentist has once a patient enters into his Dental office at Hall Rd (M59) and Van Dyke, on the border of Sterling Heights, Shelby Township and Utica Michigan is how to make the patient smile once he walks out of is Dental office. Dr Dolon believes a smile is not something to hide but a smile should be such that it should reflect the good health and the positive vibrations inside a person.
